featured.text: I even have some stuff made out of bamboo/cotton blend.

definition.zh_def: 竹子，一種快速生長的草本植物，通常具有空心的莖和堅韌的特性。
definition.en_def: A type of fast-growing grass with a hollow stem, known for its strength and versatility.
definition.example: The garden was filled with tall bamboo that swayed gently in the wind.
